EmailTemplate.subject: Free Research Report—The DZone Guide to Modern Java Spotlight
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We invite you to download a free copy of DZone’s Guide to Modern Java research partner spotlight <[[https://pivotal.io/the-dzone-guide-to-modern-java?utm_source=website&utm_campaign=DZone_Research_Partner_Spotlight&utm_medium=email]]>. The report surveyed more than 2,950 developers to better understand how they are using Java to solve today’s business problems.
Spotlight Topics include:
- The dominance of Java 8 - How developers are using new-to-Java 8 features extensively - The growth in microservice adoption - How non-Java JVM languages are proliferating and enjoying more use
The developer opinions featured in this spotlight are a clear indicator of what the health of the Java ecosystem looks like today.
Download the free report <[[https://pivotal.io/the-dzone-guide-to-modern-java?utm_source=website&utm_campaign=DZone_Research_Partner_Spotlight&utm_medium=email]]>
Cheers,
The Pivotal Team
